categories.description: Below are some of my web apps and platform projects developed throughout my personal and professional career as a Full Stack developer. To see more projects, you can visit my GitHub.

projects.title: VetCore Pro
projects.short_description: I developed a dashboard for veterinary clinics with client, pet, appointment, and inventory management. I collaborated using SCRUM, designed the database and UI/UX, built a RESTful API, managed roles through middleware, and enhanced scalability with reusable components.

projects.title: SmartOrder
projects.short_description: I built an order management system for restaurants with role-based access. Customers manage their carts and place orders, while employees handle orders in real time, complete purchases, and update the product catalog.

projects.title: JobMatch
projects.short_description: I created a web-based recruitment platform where recruiters can post job openings and developers can apply with their PDF resumes. It includes advanced search, real-time notifications, and email verification, optimizing the hiring process with efficiency and usability.

projects.title: PicConnect
projects.short_description: I developed a social media platform for sharing images, featuring dynamic profile URLs, a post system, followers, and likes. Users can upload images, comment, and customize their profiles. It includes an interactive feed that enhances content discovery and user interaction.

projects.title: EduLink
projects.short_description: I built an online tutoring platform integrated with Zoom, facilitating the management, filtering, and participation in educational sessions. It automates video calls and request handling, and allows teachers to validate new tutors, promoting accessible and collaborative learning.

projects.title: DASC UABCS
projects.short_description: I developed an institutional website for the UABCS Systems Department that enhances content management, accessibility, and the student experience. The design was supervised by faculty, and the development was fully customized.

images.alt: Overview of the DASC institutional website
images.caption: Main page with structured navigation

images.alt: Panel with resources and announcements for the university community
images.caption: Institutional resources and announcements

projects.title: LearnPlay
projects.short_description: I created an educational website for elementary children featuring interactive mini-games on math, patterns, and clock reading. It includes a lives system, unlockable levels using localStorage, and dynamic content loading from JSON, utilizing reusable components for a fun and modular experience.

images.alt: Educational game to learn analog clock reading
images.caption: Clock reading mini-game

categories.description: I design UI/UX interfaces that combine aesthetics and functionality. I aim to create experiences that are attractive, efficient, and intuitive.
I've contributed to the community through open-source projects and content creation. I enjoy sharing knowledge while continuing to deepen my areas of expertise.
